sense.name: aspect
sense.commentary: respect - usually preceded by 'in'; a detail point
sense.examples: It differs in that regard. George and Fido like peanut butter, they're the same in that regard.

sense.name: heed
sense.commentary: attentiveness, paying attention - paying particular notice (as to children or helpless people)
sense.examples: His regard to her wishes pleased her. He spends without regard for the consequences.

sense.name: compliments
sense.commentary: wish - (usually plural) a polite expression of desire for someone's welfare
sense.examples: Give him my kind regards. My best regards.

sense.name: esteem
sense.commentary: respect - the condition of being honored (esteemed or respected or well regarded); an attitude of admiration or esteem
sense.examples: It is held in high regard. A man who has earned high regard. She lost all regard for him.

sense.name: respect
sense.commentary: a feeling of friendship and esteem
sense.examples: She mistook his manly regard for love. He inspires regard.

sense.name: gaze
sense.examples: He fixed his paternal regard on me.
